mapper.select: select r.rvwno, s.sname, r.cont, m.pfp , s.stdno from study_review r left join member m on r.memno=m.memno left join study_info s on r.stdno=s.stdno order by r.rvwno desc limit 0, 4
SELECT ctgr, count(*) as cnt FROM study_review r left join study_info s on r.stdno = s.stdno GROUP BY ctgr ORDER BY FIELD (ctgr, 'it','언어','국가시험','기사','금융','취업','토론','기타')
mapper.insert: insert into study_review(cont, rating, cdt, stdno, memno) values (#{content}, #{rating}, now(), #{study.no}, #{member.no})
